item.description:
Date:
Saturday, April 13, 9pm.

What The Critics Say:

"The Love Dogs are funny, funky, and push a beat 50's style until you can't help but tap your feet. With big thick horns and humorous, sexy lyrics, this band is built for fun."

-BLUES REVIEW

"Even though the music could make Leonardo's David dance, it's the songwriting that separates these Dogs from the rest of the pack."

-THE NEW YORK POST

"If these guys don't make you want to dance, look in the mirror. You're the dog."

-BOSTON HERALD

"Steamy R&B from great players with an unabashed love of rhythm!"

-BOSTON GLOBE

"The Dogs combine tongue in cheek humor with impressive musical chops...the band captures the spirit that spawned jump music...a heavy contender for national fame."

-WORCESTER PHOENIX

“The Love Dogs celebrate time honored black R&B and it’s related musics. Scheer and his hounds prove they are more than ready to slip their leash and put the big blues bite on America.”

-DOWN BEAT

"Scheer's razor-sharp vocals (the man even scats convincingly) are a throwback to the great days of Big Joe Turner and Wynonie Harris."

-SOUTHLAND BLUES, California

"An awesome horn section, a killer pianist, and one of the sassiest frontmen ever to hit the stage."

-CREATIVE LOAFING, Atlanta, GA


Web Site:
http://www.thelovedogs.com
Ticket:
$12.50
Ticket Online up to 24 hours in advance:
$12.50

Please get your tickets in advance. Whining about not being able to get in will not be tolerated.
item.name: The Love Dogs - Acton Jazz Cafe Dance Party
